Hello {{UserFullName}},

 

Thanks for building with Copilot Studio. Your agent "{{AgentName}}” has been discovered by our Compliance Center.

 

At this time, no compliance case was opened.

 

What this means
• You can continue to iterate in your current environment.  
• Governance is “reactive”: if a future change pushes your agent past a risk threshold, the system will open a compliance case and notify you.

 

How thresholds work (high level)
The tables below represent the Copilot Studio agent configurations that are scanned with an associated risk level. The risk level determines the policy action that will be enforced if the required actions are not completed within the SLA. 

 

Low risk violations are allowed; in this case, complete the intake submission within the provided SLA. However, if any medium or high-risk violations are present, those must be corrected before the SLA expired.

 

{{ThresholdsMatrix}}

 

Heads up on enforcement 
If a case is opened later and required intake or fixes aren’t completed within the indicated deadline, the system may apply enforcement (e.g., agent quarantine or deletion) per policy.

 

Help & resources
• Compliance guidance: {{GuidanceLink}} 
• Contact the CoE Admin team: {{AdminContactEmail}}

 

Thank you for helping us keep our agents secure and compliant.
— Compliance Center
